snippet: There was no immediate claim of responsibility for the attack, but the Pakistani Taliban have repeatedly targeted health workers vaccinating against polio.
abstract: Gunman shoots and kills one policeman and wounds another as they provided security for team of polio eradication health workers in northwestern Pakistan.
lead_paragraph: There was no immediate claim of responsibility for the attack, but the Pakistani Taliban have repeatedly targeted health workers vaccinating against polio.

headline.seo: Pakistan Police Guarding Polio Workers Are Attacked
headline.main: Gunman Attacks Police Officer Guarding Polio Workers in Pakistan
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: Gunman Attacks Polio Vaccination Team
